org.mini2Dx.core.engine

Interface Positionable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Updatable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CollisionBox, CollisionCircle, CollisionPoint

    public interface Positionable
extends Updatable
    A common interface for objects that can be positioned with an x and y coordinate

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Positionable> 
      void      		 addPostionChangeListener(PositionChangeListener<T> listener)
      Adds a PositionChangeListener to be notified of coordinate changes
      float getDistanceTo(Positionable positionable)
      Returns this distance between this object's x,y coordinates and the provided Positionable's xy coordinates
      float getX()
      Returns the x coordinate of this object
      float getY()
      Returns the y coordinate of this object
      <T extends Positionable> 
      void      		 removePositionChangeListener(PositionChangeListener<T> listener)
      Removes a PositionChangeListener to stop it being notified of coordinate changes

      • Methods inherited from interface org.mini2Dx.core.engine.Updatable

        interpolate, update

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        float getX()
        Returns the x coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        0 by default

      • getY

        float getY()
        Returns the y coordinate of this object
        Returns:
        0 by default

      • getDistanceTo

        float getDistanceTo(Positionable positionable)
        Returns this distance between this object's x,y coordinates and the provided Positionable's xy coordinates
        Parameters:
        positionable - The Positionable to retrieve the distance from
        Returns:
        0 if the xy coordinates are the same

      • addPostionChangeListener

        <T extends Positionable> void addPostionChangeListener(PositionChangeListener<T> listener)
        Adds a PositionChangeListener to be notified of coordinate changes
        Parameters:
        listener - The PositionChangeListener to add

      • removePositionChangeListener

        <T extends Positionable> void removePositionChangeListener(PositionChangeListener<T> listener)
        Removes a PositionChangeListener to stop it being notified of coordinate changes
        Parameters:
        listener - The PositionChangeListener to remove
